GapFillDragDrop.Title: Revision of question forms
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Pete wants to do more exercise and he is asking his friend Chris about a gym. Drag the correct question words to the spaces.

Content.Question:
1. What's the name of your gym?
The Triangle.
2. Where exactly is it?
It's in Spring Road.
3. How much is it to become a member?
Â£40 a month.
4. What kind of classes do they have?
Aerobics, weights, exercise classes, swimming. Lots!
5. Which class do you go to?
Aerobics.
6. Who's the teacher?
A man called Joe.
7. How many people go to your class?
About 30 usually.
8. How long is each class?
One and a half hours.
9. When do you go?
On Wednesday evenings.
10. How can I find out more?
I'll give you their telephone number.
